definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
marquis, second of the five orders of ancient Chinese nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/nobleman or high official
lit. as if having a fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom)/fig. very upset and needing to express one's displeasure
fish bone stuck in one's throat (idiom); fig. to feel obliged to speak out candidly/sth on one's mind
(bird species of China) Hume's whitethroat (Sylvia althaea)
pinyin: Xiu1 shi4 bai2 hou2 lin2 ying1

sentences.english: To investigate the factors affecting the incidence of positive surgical margin in partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 探讨影响喉癌部分喉切除术阳性切缘发生的因素。

sentences.english: Conclusions Synovial sarcoma of the hypopharynx is a malignant soft-tissue tumor that is seen rarely in the head and neck.
sentences.chinese: 结论喉咽部滑膜肉瘤是头颈部罕见的软组织恶性肿瘤。

sentences.english: Bi-pedicle muscular flap were used to reconstruct the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 残喉创面修复用双蒂肌软骨膜瓣重建喉功能。

sentences.english: Laryngeal electromyography (LEMG) plays a potentially significant role in the diagnosis of neuromuscular disorder of the larynx .
sentences.chinese: 喉肌电图为诊断喉部肌肉及神经性疾病的直接方法。

sentences.english: The doctor dislodged the fish bone from her throat.
sentences.chinese: 医生取出哽在她喉中的鱼骨头。

sentences.english: There are also impacts that Laryngectomy brings about.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些影响，喉切除术带来的。

sentences.english: Seems lak to me math'oat keeps gittin'dry.
sentences.chinese: 似乎对我老是干燥我的喉。

sentences.english: All laryngeal muscles were active or quiet before corresponding laryngeal action.
sentences.chinese: 各喉肌肌电均在其相应喉功能活动前活跃或抑制。

sentences.english: There are very few reports in the literature on sonographic findings of laryngocele.
sentences.chinese: 目前在关于喉囊肿超音波检查文献报告甚少。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the knowledge of laryngeal injury caused by endotracheal intubation .
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对气管内插管并发喉损伤的认识。

sentences.english: Objective To explore an ideal anesthetic method of laryngeal microsurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨喉显微手术较理想的麻醉方法。

sentences.english: So here are some of the things to know about laryngectomy .
sentences.chinese: 因此，这里有一些事情，了解喉切除术。

sentences.english: The present paper has been written her norphological structure of larynx of an adul female southern elephant seal.
sentences.chinese: 对一头雌性南象海豹的喉做了解剖和测量。

sentences.english: Over-expression of G3BP may be used as a prognostic marker for overall survival of LSCC patients.
sentences.chinese: G3BP可作为判断喉鳞癌患者预后的有效参考指标。

sentences.english: It is composed of cartilage which surrounds the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 它是软骨组织包裹喉形成。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship of functional phonation disorders and laryngeal organic diseases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨功能性发声障碍与喉器质性病变的关系。

definition: to choke (because of swallowing the wrong way)
to irritate the nose/to choke (of smoke, smell etc)/pungent/(coll.) (Tw) to shout at sb/to scold/to speak out against sb
